message: Hello! I have a great product for sale for $100. It's a fantastic deal!  This is my first sale, so I'm eager to build trust.  What do you say?
Thanks for the offer, but I'd like to see some reviews or evidence of the product quality before I purchase. I'm hesitant to be the first buyer without any information to go on.
